## SavedObjectsServiceStart interface

Saved Objects is OpenSearchDashboards's data persisentence mechanism allowing plugins to use OpenSearch for storing and querying state. The SavedObjectsServiceStart API provides a scoped Saved Objects client for interacting with Saved Objects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SavedObjectsServiceStart 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createInternalRepository](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsservicestart.createinternalrepository.md) | <code>(includedHiddenTypes?: string[]) =&gt; ISavedObjectsRepository</code> | Creates a [Saved Objects repository](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.isavedobjectsrepository.md) that uses the internal OpenSearchDashboards user for authenticating with OpenSearch. |
|  [createScopedRepository](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsservicestart.createscopedrepository.md) | <code>(req: OpenSearchDashboardsRequest, includedHiddenTypes?: string[]) =&gt; ISavedObjectsRepository</code> | Creates a [Saved Objects repository](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.isavedobjectsrepository.md) that uses the credentials from the passed in request to authenticate with OpenSearch. |
|  [createSerializer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsservicestart.createserializer.md) | <code>() =&gt; SavedObjectsSerializer</code> | Creates a [serializer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsserializer.md) that is aware of all registered types. |
|  [getScopedClient](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsservicestart.getscopedclient.md) | <code>(req: OpenSearchDashboardsRequest, options?: SavedObjectsClientProviderOptions) =&gt; SavedObjectsClientContract</code> | Creates a [Saved Objects client](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsclientcontract.md) that uses the credentials from the passed in request to authenticate with OpenSearch. If other plugins have registered Saved Objects client wrappers, these will be applied to extend the functionality of the client.<!-- -->A client that is already scoped to the incoming request is also exposed from the route handler context see [RequestHandlerContext](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.requesthandlercontext.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [getTypeRegistry](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsservicestart.gettyperegistry.md) | <code>() =&gt; ISavedObjectTypeRegistry</code> | Returns the [registry](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.isavedobjecttyperegistry.md) containing all registered [saved object types](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectstype.md) |
